past jobs.Title: Associate Product Manager
past jobs.Description: Identified a user drop-off point in the benefits section of our website, leading to the development of a new benefits page and streamlined onboarding pathway, resulting in a 40,000-click engagement on launch day and an 8% increase in conversion rates.

past jobs.Title: UX Designer
past jobs.Description: Conducted over 40 usability tests and organized our design library/system to redesign company website.

past jobs.Title: Data Analyst
past jobs.Description: Designed and managed a nationwide social game for local partner organizations that resulted in over 5,000 native posts and over 3.5 million organic interactions as part of Small Business Week.
